Name: UN-ARC-NL
Title: UN-Automatic Rifle for Combat
Description: 7.62mm full-length assault rifle. Its precision-machined long barel gives it greater accuracy than other assault rifles.

Name: Wu S.Pistol
Title: Windurger No.2 Silent Pistol
Description: Single-shot tranquilizer handgun. This miniaturized tranquilizer gun delivers an immobilization agent from a distance, but has poor rapid-fire capability as each round must be loaded manually.

Name: Kabarga-83
Title: Kabarga-83 Shotgun
Description: Automatic Shotgun. Combines the power of a traditional shotgun with a large-capacity magazine

Name: UN-AAM
Title: UN Modular Automatic Weapon
Description: 5.56 general-purpose machine gun. This squad fire support weapon combines belt-fed rapid fire capability with an ease of handling comparable to an assault rifle.

Name: Uragan-5
Title: BTS Instrument Design Bureau Uragan-5 Pistol
Description: Handgun designed to fire shotshells. The power of shotshells combined with close-quarters maneuverability makes for incredible anti-personnel stopping power. The enlarged chamber enables multiple ammunition types to be loaded.
